trans-unit.source: Describes the visual structure of a data object.
trans-unit.target: 描述数据对象的可视结构。

trans-unit.source: You use a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to specify the visualization of your data objects.
trans-unit.target: 你使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>指定将数据对象的可视化效果。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects are particularly useful when you are binding an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to an entire collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> 你正在绑定时，对象都特别有用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>整个集合。

trans-unit.source: Without specific instructions, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> displays the string representation of the objects in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有特殊说明<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>显示集合中的字符串表示形式的对象。

trans-unit.source: In that case, you can use a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to define the appearance of your data objects.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>可以定义数据对象的外观。

trans-unit.source: The content of your <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> becomes the visual structure of your data objects.
trans-unit.target: 内容您<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>变成数据对象的可视结构。

trans-unit.source: For an in-depth discussion, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关深入讨论，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> inline.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>内联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> specifies that each data item appears as three <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>指定每个数据项显示为三个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the data object is a class called `Task`.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，数据对象是一个名为类`Task`。

trans-unit.source: Note that each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> element in this template is bound to a property of the `Task` class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>此模板中的元素绑定到的属性`Task`类。

trans-unit.source: It is more common to define a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> in the resources section so it can be a reusable object, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 它是更常见的是定义<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>中的资源节，以便它可以是一个可重用的对象，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: Now you can use `myTaskTemplate` as a resource, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: 现在可以将 `myTaskTemplate` 用作资源，如以下示例所示：

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Introduction to Data Templating Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整示例，请参阅[数据模板化示例简介](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160009)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If the template is intended for object data, this is the Type name of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 如果模板专用于对象数据，则这是数据对象的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 属性初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To refer to the Type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要引用类的类型名称，使用[X:type 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this is the string that represents the tag name of the data.
trans-unit.target: 如果模板旨在用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据，这是表示数据的标记名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default key of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 的默认键。

trans-unit.source: The default key of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 的默认键。

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) on a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> that is in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>, the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataTemplateKey%2A> is used as the key.
trans-unit.target: 如果你未设置[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)上<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>，位于<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>、<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataTemplateKey%2A>用作的键。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type for which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> is intended.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> 所针对的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is very similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Style> class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是非常类似于<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Style>类。

trans-unit.source: When you set this property to the data type without specifying an `x:Key`, the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> gets applied automatically to data objects of that type.
trans-unit.target: 当你设置此属性为数据类型而无需指定`x:Key`、<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>获取自动应用到该类型的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that when you do that the `x:Key` is set implicitly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当你执行此操作`x:Key`隐式设置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you assign this <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> an `x:Key` value, you are overriding the implicit `x:Key` and the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> would not be applied automatically.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果将此分配<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>`x:Key`值，您要重写的隐式`x:Key`和<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>不会自动应用。

trans-unit.source: Also note that if you are binding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to a collection of `Task` objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> does not use the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> automatically.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，如果你正在绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>到的集合`Task`对象，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>不使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>自动。

trans-unit.source: This is because the binding on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> needs more information to distinguish whether you want to bind to an entire collection or the individual objects.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为上的绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>需要区分你是否想要将绑定到整个集合或单个对象的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> is tracking the selection of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> type, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> binding to "`/`" to indicate that you are interested in the current item.
trans-unit.target: 如果你<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>跟踪的选定内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>类型，你可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Path%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>绑定到"`/`"以指示你感兴趣的当前项。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 将绑定到集合和显示基于所选内容的信息](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you need to specify the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你需要指定<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>显式通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplate%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> property is particularly useful when you have a <xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection> of different types of data objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>必须时特别有用属性<xref:System.Windows.Data.CompositeCollection>的不同类型的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: If this property targets an XML element that is not in the default namespace, you must precede the element name with the namespace or a namespace designator.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性提供程序针对不位于默认命名空间的 XML 元素，则必须在前面带有命名空间或命名空间指示符的元素名称。

trans-unit.source: For XML exposed through LINQ for XML, the namespace appears in braces, preceded by a brace escape sequence:
trans-unit.target: 通过 LINQ 公开 for XML 的 XML，对于命名空间将显示在括号内，前面由大括号转义序列：

trans-unit.source: For XML exposed through XPath, the element name is preceded by a namespace designator established by an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping>:
trans-unit.target: 对于通过 XPath 公开的 XML，元素名称的前面由的实例建立的命名空间指示符<xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMapping>:

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *typeName*
trans-unit.target: *typeName*

trans-unit.source: If the template is intended for object data, this property contains the type name of the data object (as a string).
trans-unit.target: 如果模板旨在用于对象数据，则此属性包含的数据对象的类型名称 （作为字符串）。

trans-unit.source: To refer to the type name of the class, use the [x:Type Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要引用类的类型名称，使用[X:type 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-type-markup-extension.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the template is intended for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data, this property contains the XML element name.
trans-unit.target: 如果模板旨在用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据，此属性包含的 XML 元素名称。

trans-unit.source: See the documentation remarks for details about specifying a non-default namespace for the XML element.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅有关指定的 XML 元素的非默认命名空间文档备注以了解详情。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of triggers that apply property values or perform actions based on one or more conditions.
trans-unit.target: 获取触发器的集合，这些触发器根据一个或多个条件应用属性值或执行操作。

trans-unit.source: A collection of trigger objects.
trans-unit.target: 触发器对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If you are creating triggers within a data template, the setters of the triggers should be setting properties that are within the scope of the data template.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建数据模板中的触发器，则触发器的 setter 应设置数据模板的作用域内的属性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it may be more suitable to create triggers using a style that targets the type that contains the data.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它可能更适合于创建触发器使用的包含的数据类型为目标的样式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are binding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control, the containers are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你正在绑定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控件，则容器为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>对象。

trans-unit.source: If you are using triggers to set properties that are not within the scope of the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>, then it may be more suitable to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> style and create triggers within that style.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用触发器来设置不在范围内的属性<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>，则它可能更适合于创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>样式，创建该样式中的触发器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see What Belongs in a DataTemplate? in the [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅什么所属 DataTemplate 中？在[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] via the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅在中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过集合语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象，并使用它的各种方法，例如 Add。

trans-unit.source: The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, the collection itself is read-write.
trans-unit.target: 要访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的该集合本身是读写。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *OneOrMoreTriggers*
trans-unit.target: *OneOrMoreTriggers*

trans-unit.source: Zero or more <xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: 零个或多<xref:System.Windows.TriggerBase>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.Triggers%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.Triggers%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [Data Binding Demo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的示例，请参阅[数据绑定演示](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=163703)。

trans-unit.source: The element this template is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 要应用此模板的元素。

trans-unit.source: Checks the templated parent against a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: 根据一组规则检查模板化父级。

trans-unit.source: The method uses the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 该方法使用以下规则：

trans-unit.source: The `templatedParent` must be a non-null <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: `templatedParent`必须为非 null <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> must be applied to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>必须应用于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>。
